snippet.title: VR Skater | A VR Skateboarding Game Coming to Steam Early Access
snippet.description:
VR Skater is a highly immersive street skateboarding game. 
It will be available on Steam Early Access starting April 30.
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1285920/VR_Skater/

The game is still in an early stage of development. But many can't wait to finally get on the virtual skateboard. Now that the core mechanics are ready, we don't want to keep this from you any longer. 

(c) 2021, DEFICIT Games GmbH
